attributes.action: Inforce a three strike rule for foreign numberplated cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the governments failure to control imigration/Illegal workers to the UK, the amount of foreign platted cars on are roads openly breaking UK rules (Tax, Insurance, roadworthyness, parking, speeding etc) is totally out of control.
Its about time this was handled in a controlled manner, I would suggest a three-strike rule..
Where any foreign plated car ticketted or stopped for a motoring offence 3-times is seized immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
